data.title: Pennsylvania Contacts
data.meta_description: State Office Contacts USDA Rural Development 359 East Park Drive, Suite 4, Harrisburg, PA 17111 Phone: 717-237-2299 Bob Morgan, State Director The Pennsylvania State Office, located in Harrisburg, PA, administers USDA Rural Development programs through nine Area Offices across the state. All offices are open to the public Monday through Friday from 8:00 a.m. until 4:30 p.m.
data.text:
State Office Contacts

USDA Rural Development

359 East Park Drive, Suite 4, Harrisburg, PA 17111

Phone: 717-237-2299

Bob Morgan, State Director

The Pennsylvania State Office, located in Harrisburg, PA, administers USDA Rural Development programs through nine Area Offices across the state. All offices are open to the public Monday through Friday from 8:00 a.m. until 4:30 p.m.

For all general housing program-related inquiries, contact the Housing Program Staff at (717) 237-2186 or email pasfh@usda.gov. For all inquiries related to Guaranteed Housing Programs, contact SFHGLPFOUR@usda.gov.

For questions about payments, moratorium requests, payoffs, etc. call the Customer Service Center at (800) 414-1226.

For questions about the Multi-Family Housing Program MFHFODNortheast@usda.gov or 800-292-8293.

Water and Environmental Programs (WEP)

General Program Inquiries: (717) 237-2188

Pennsylvania State Office

Business Programs

General Program Inquiries: (717) 237-2189

Community Facilities (CF)

General Program Inquiries: (717) 237-2199

Area Offices

Butler Area Office

625 Evans City Road, Suite 101

Butler, PA 16001-8704

(724) 482-4800, ext. 4, (Phone)

(855) 750-7062 (Fax)

Serving Allegheny, Armstrong, Beaver, Butler, Greene, Indiana, Washington Counties.

Clinton Area Office

216 Spring Run Road, Room 103

Mill Hall, PA 17751-9543

Phone: (570) 749-3082

Fax: 855-831-7928

Serving Cameron, Centre, Clearfield, Clinton, Elk, Potter and McKean Counties.

Crawford Area Office

14699 N. Main Street, Extension

Meadville, PA 16335-9441

(814) 547-5963 (Phone)

(855) 827-7510 (Fax)

Serving Clarion, Crawford, Erie, Forest, Jefferson, Lawrence, Mercer, Venango, and Warren Counties.

Cumberland Area Office

401 E. Louther St., Suite 304

Carlisle, PA 17013-2652

(717) 218-3002 (Phone)

(855) 813-2863 (Fax)

Serving Bedford, Cumberland, Franklin, Fulton, Huntingdon, Juniata, Mifflin, and Perry Counties.

Lebanon Area Office

2120 Cornwall Road, Suite 7

Lebanon, PA 17042-9790

(717) 376-3515 (Phone)

(855) 822-1790 (Fax)

Serving Adams, Chester, Dauphin, Delaware, Lancaster, Lebanon and York Counties.

Lehigh Area Office

2211 Mack Blvd.

Allentown, PA 18103-5623

(484) 795-7619 (Phone)

(855) 742-4168 (Fax)

Serving Berks, Bucks, Carbon, Lehigh, Monroe, Montgomery, Northampton, Philadelphia, Pike, and Schuylkill Counties.

Lycoming Area Office

542 County Farm Rd, Suite 205

Montoursville, PA 17754-9209

(570) 433-3902, ext. 4 (Phone)

(570) 433-3013 (Fax)

Serving Columbia, Lycoming, Montour, Northumberland, Snyder, Sullivan, Tioga and Union Counties.

Westmoreland Area Office

214 Donohoe Road, Suite A

Greensburg, PA 15601-7552

(724) 261-3903

(724) 837-9762 (Fax)

General Housing Line (724) 261-3887

Wyoming Area Office

21 Hollowcrest Road

Tunkhannock, PA 18657-6632

(570) 836-5111, ext. 4 (Phone)

(570) 836-4432 (Fax)

Serving Bradford, Lackawanna, Luzerne, Susquehanna, Wayne and Wyoming Counties.

State Office

The USDA Rural Development State Office is located in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania. Office hours are 8:00 a.m. until 4:30 p.m., Monday through Friday, EST. If you have a Freedom of Information Act Request, please contact: RD.FOIA@usda.gov.

USDA Rural Development

Pennsylvania State Office

359 East Park Drive, Suite 4

Harrisburg, PA 17110-2747

Main Telephone Number: (717) 237-2299

Fax Number: (855) 813-2864
